snippet: A former teacher and dancer for the Dallas Mavericks has been arrested in the fatal shooting of four people in two Dallas-area homes.
abstract: Erbie Bowser, former teacher and dancer for the Dallas Mavericks, has been arrested in the fatal shooting of four people in two Dallas-area homes; police say Bowser used an explosive device in one of the attacks.
lead_paragraph: A former teacher and dancer for the Dallas Mavericks has been arrested in the fatal shooting of four people in two Dallas-area homes.

headline.main: Texas: Man Held in Four Killings
headline.print_headline: Texas: Man Held In Four Killings
